title: Coronavirus Updates - America's Fourth Wave, Vaccine Passports & A "Double Mutant" Virus
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - America's Fourth Wave, Vaccine Passports & A "Double Mutant" Virus
description:
Experts sound the alarm about a potential fourth wave of the coronavirus in the U.S., Fox News freaks out over the notion of vaccine passports, and COVID-19 variants pose new risks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
